docs.title: Gradle (Kotlin DSL)
docs.text: implementation("io.github.vinnih-1:osukdk:0.2.0-alpha")

docs.title: Maven
docs.text:
<dependency>
    <groupId>io.github.vinnih-1</groupId>
    <artifactId>osukdk</artifactId>
    <version>0.2.0-ALPHA</version>
</dependency>

docs.title: Client Credentials Grant
docs.text:
val api = Authorization(YOUR_CLIENT_ID, YOUR_CLIENT_SECRET).create()
val user = api.getUser(21009314)
println(user.username)

docs.title: Authorization Code Grant
docs.text:
val grantType = GrantType.AUTHORIZATION_CODE
val redirectUri = "" // This must match the registered Application Callback URL exactly.

val api = Authorization(
    YOUR_CLIENT_ID, YOUR_CLIENT_SECRET, grantType = grantType, redirectUri = redirectUri).create()

docs.title: Beatmap Packs
docs.text: suspend fun getBeatmapPack(pack, legacyOnly): BeatmapPackResponse

docs.title: Get Beatmap Pack
docs.text:
Gets the beatmap pack for the specified beatmap pack tag.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-beatmap-pack

Attribute Description pack The tag of the beatmap pack to be returned. legacyOnly (Optional) Whether or not to consider lazer scores for user completion data. Defaults to false. 
suspend fun getBeatmapPacks(type, cursor): BeatmapPackResponse

docs.title: Get Beatmap Packs
docs.text:
Returns a list of beatmap packs.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-beatmap-packs

Attribute Description type (Optional) of the beatmap packs to be returned. Defaults to standard. cursor (Optional) for pagination.

docs.title: Beatmap Scores
docs.text: suspend fun getUserBeatmapScore(beatmapId, userId, legacyOnly, mode, mods): BeatmapUserScore

docs.title: Get a User Beatmap score
docs.text:
Return a User's score on a Beatmap

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-a-user-beatmap-score

Attribute Description beatmapId Id of the Beatmap. userId Id of the User. legacyOnly (Optional) Whether or not to exclude lazer scores. Defaults to false. mode (Optional) The Ruleset to get scores for. mods (Optional) An array of matching Mods, or none. 
suspend fun getUserBeatmapScores(beatmapId, userId, legacyOnly, mode): List<Score>

docs.title: Get a User Beatmap scores
docs.text:
Return a User's scores on a Beatmap

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-a-user-beatmap-scores

Attribute Description beatmapId Id of the Beatmap. userId Id of the User. legacyOnly (Optional) Whether or not to exclude lazer scores. Defaults to false. mode (Optional) The Ruleset to get scores for. 
suspend fun getBeatmapScores(beatmapId, legacyOnly, mode, mods, type): BeatmapScores

docs.title: Get Beatmap scores
docs.text:
Returns the top scores for a beatmap. Depending on user preferences, this may only show legacy scores.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-beatmap-scores

Attribute Description beatmapId Id of the Beatmap. legacyOnly (Optional) Whether or not to exclude lazer scores. Defaults to false. mode (Optional) The Ruleset to get scores for. mods (Optional) An array of matching Mods, or none. type (Optional) Beatmap score ranking type.

docs.title: Beatmaps
docs.text: suspend fun getBeatmaps(ids): List<Beatmap>

docs.title: Get Beatmaps
docs.text:
Returns a list of beatmaps.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-beatmaps

Attribute Description ids Beatmap IDs to be returned. Specify once for each beatmap ID requested. Up to 50 beatmaps can be requested at once. 
suspend fun getBeatmap(beatmapId): Beatmap

docs.title: Get Beatmap
docs.text:
Gets beatmap data for the specified beatmap ID.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-beatmap

Attribute Description beatmapId The ID of the beatmap. 
suspend fun getBeatmapAttributes(beatmapId, mods, mode): BeatmapDifficultyAttributes

docs.title: Get Beatmap Attributes
docs.text:
Returns difficulty attributes of beatmap with specific mode and mods combination.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-beatmap-attributes

Attribute Description beatmapId The ID of the beatmap. mods array of mods mode Ruleset of the difficulty attributes. Only valid if it's the beatmap ruleset or the beatmap can be converted to the specified ruleset. Defaults to ruleset of the specified beatmap.

docs.title: Beatmapset Discussions
docs.text: suspend fun getBeatmapsetDiscussionPosts(beatmapsetDiscussionId, limit, page, sort, types, userId, withDeleted): BeatmapsetDiscussionPostsResponse

docs.title: Get Beatmapset Discussion Posts
docs.text:
Returns the posts of beatmapset discussions.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-beatmapset-discussion-posts

Attribute Description beatmapsetDiscussionId id of the BeatmapsetDiscussion. limit Maximum number of results. page Search result page. sort for NEWEST first; id_asc for OLDEST first. Defaults to NEWEST. types first, reply, system are the valid values. Defaults to reply userId The id of the User. withDeleted This param has no effect as api calls do not currently receive group permissions. 
suspend fun getBeatmapsetDiscussionVotes(beatmapsetDiscussionId, limit, page, receiver, score, sort, userId, withDeleted): BeatmapsetDiscussionVotesResponse

docs.title: Get Beatmapset Discussion Votes
docs.text:
Returns the votes given to beatmapset discussions.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-beatmapset-discussion-votes

Attribute Description beatmapsetDiscussionId id of the BeatmapsetDiscussion. limit Maximum number of results. page Search result page. receiver The id of the User receiving the votes. score 1 for up vote, -1 for down vote. sort for NEWEST first; id_asc for OLDEST first. Defaults to NEWEST. userId The id of the User. withDeleted This param has no effect as api calls do not currently receive group permissions. 
suspend fun getBeatmapsetDiscussion(beatmapId, beatmapsetId, beatmapsetStatus, limit, messageTypes, onlyUnresolved, page, sort, userId, withDeleted, cursorString): BeatmapsetDiscussionResponse

docs.title: Get Beatmapset Discussions
docs.text:
Returns a list of beatmapset discussions.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-beatmapset-discussions

Attribute Description beatmapId id of the Beatmap. beatmapsetId id of the Beatmapset. beatmapsetStatus One of all, ranked, qualified, disqualified, never_qualified. Defaults to all. limit Maximum number of results. messageTypes suggestion, problem, mapper_note, praise, hype, review. Blank defaults to all types. onlyUnresolved true to show only unresolved issues; false, otherwise. Defaults to false. page Search result page. sort for NEWEST first; id_asc for OLDEST first. Defaults to NEWEST. userId The id of the User. withDeleted This param has no effect as api calls do not currently receive group permissions. cursorString CursorString for pagination.

docs.title: Beatmapsets
docs.text: suspend fun searchBeatmapset(cursorString): SearchBeatmapsetResponse

docs.title: Search Beatmapset
docs.text:
TODO: DOCS

Attribute Description cursorString CursorString for pagination. 
suspend fun getBeatmapset(beatmapsetId): Beatmapset

docs.title: Get Beatmapset
docs.text:
TODO: DOCS

Attribute Description beatmapsetId The ID of the beatmapset. 
suspend fun getBeatmapsetEvents(): BeatmapsetEventsResponse

docs.title: Get Beatmapset Events
docs.text:
TODO: DOCS

No parameters.

docs.title: Changelog
docs.text: suspend fun getChangelogBuild(stream, build): Build

docs.title: Get Changelog Build
docs.text:
Returns details of the specified build.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-changelog-build

Attribute Description stream (Optional) Update stream name. build (Optional) Build version. 
suspend fun lookupChangelogBuild(build, messageFormats): Build

docs.title: Lookup Changelog Build
docs.text:
Returns details of the specified build.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#lookup-changelog-build

Attribute Description build (Optional) Build version, update stream name, or build ID. messageFormats (Optional) html, markdown. Default to both.

docs.title: Scores
docs.text: suspend fun downloadScore(mode, cursorString): ScoreResponse

docs.title: Download Score
docs.text:
This method returns ByteArray from Score

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-apiv2scoresscoredownload

Attribute Description scoreId Id of the Score isOldFormat If your score ID is in the old format (https://osu.ppy.sh/scores/osu/4459998279) this param should be true, or if is in new format (https://osu.ppy.sh/scores/1695006824) you can ignore this param. Defaults to false. 
suspend fun getScore(mode, cursorString): ScoreResponse

docs.title: Get Scores
docs.text:
Returns all passed scores. Up to 1000 scores will be returned in order of oldest to latest. Most recent scores will be returned if cursor_string parameter is not specified.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-scores97

Attribute Description mode (Optional) The Ruleset to get scores for. cursorString (Optional) Next set of scores

docs.title: Users
docs.text: suspend fun getUser(userId, mode): User

docs.title: Get User
docs.text:
This endpoint returns the detail of specified user.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-user

Attribute Description userId Id of the user. mode (Optional) osu mode will be used if not specified. 
suspend fun getUsers(ids, includeVariantStatistics): List<User>

docs.title: Get Users
docs.text:
Returns list of users.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-users

Attribute Description ids User id to be returned. Specify once for each user id requested. Up to 50 users can be requested at once. includeVariantStatistics (Optional) Whether to additionally include statistics variants (default: true). 
suspend fun getUserKudosu(userId, limit, offset): List<KudosuHistory>

docs.title: Get User Kudosu
docs.text:
Returns kudosu history

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-user-kudosu

Attribute Description userId Id of the user. limit (Optional) Maximum number of results. defaults to 50 offset (Optional) Result offset for pagination. defaults to 0 
suspend fun getUserScore(userId, type, legacyOnly, includeFails, mode, offset, limit): List<Score>

docs.title: Get User Scores
docs.text:
This method returns the scores of specified user.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-user-scores

Attribute Description userId Id of the user. type (Optional) Score type. legacyOnly (Optional) Whether or not to exclude lazer scores. Defaults to false includeFails (Optional) Only for recent scores, include scores of failed plays. Set to true to include them. Defaults to false. mode (Optional) Mode of the scores to be returned. Defaults to osu mode. offset (Optional) Result offset for pagination. default is 0 limit (Optional) Maximum number of results. default is 100 
suspend fun getUserRecentActivity(userId, offset, limit): List<Event>

docs.title: Get User Recent Activity
docs.text:
Returns recent activity.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-user-recent-activity

Attribute Description userId Id of the user. offset (Optional) Result offset for pagination. default is 0 limit (Optional) Maximum number of results. default is 100 
suspend fun searchBeatmapsPassed(userId, beatmapsetIds, excludeConverts, isLegacy, noDiffReduction, rulesetId): List<Beatmap>

docs.title: Search Beatmaps Passed
docs.text:
Searches for the Beatmaps a User has passed by Beatmapset.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#search-beatmaps-passed

Attribute Description userId Id of the user. beatmapsetIds (Optional) The list of Beatmapset. excludeConverts (Optional) Whether or not to exclude converts. isLegacy (Optional) Whether or not to consider legacy scores. Leave empty for all scores. noDiffReduction (Optional) Whether or not to exclude diff reduction mods. Defaults to true. rulesetId (Optional) The Ruleset ID. Leave empty for all rulesets. 
suspend fun getOwnData(mode): User

docs.title: Get Own Data
docs.text:
Similar to Get User but with authenticated user (token owner) as user id.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-own-data

Attribute Description mode (Optional) osu mode will be used if not specified.

docs.title: Comments
docs.text: suspend fun getComments(after, commentableType, commentableId, cursor, parentId, sort): CommentBundle

docs.title: Get Comments
docs.text:
Returns a list of comments and their replies up to 2 levels deep.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-comments

Attribute Description after (Optional) Return comments after the specified comment id. commentableType (Optional) The type of resource to get comments for. commentableId (Optional) The id of the resource to get comments for. cursor (Optional) Pagination option. See CommentSort for detail. parentId (Optional) Limit to comments which are reply to the specified id. Specify 0 to get top level comments. sort (Optional) Sort option as defined in CommentSort. Defaults to NEW for guests and user-specified default when authenticated. 
suspend fun getComment(commentId): CommentBundle

docs.title: Get Comment
docs.text:
Gets a comment and its replies up to 2 levels deep.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-comment

Attribute Description commentId The comment ID.

docs.title: Events
docs.text: suspend fun getEvents(sort, cursorString): EventsResponse

docs.title: Get Events
docs.text:
Returns a collection of Events in order of creation time.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-events

Attribute Description sort (Optional) Sorting option. Valid values are id_desc (default) and id_asc. cursorString (Optional) CursorString for pagination.

docs.title: Forums
docs.text: suspend fun replyTopic(topicId: Int, body: String): ForumPost

docs.title: Reply Topic
docs.text:
Create a post replying to the specified topic.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#reply-topic

Attribute Description topicId Id of the topic to be replied to. body Content of the reply post. 
suspend fun getTopicListing(forumId: String? = null, sort: String? = "new", limit: Int? = 50, cursorString: String? = null): ForumTopicResponse

docs.title: Get Topic Listing
docs.text:
Get a sorted list of topics, optionally from a specific forum

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-topic-listing

Attribute Description forumId Id of a specific forum to get topics from. sort Topic sorting option. Valid values are new (default) and old. Both sort by the topic's last post time. limit Maximum number of topics to be returned (50 at most and by default). cursorString for pagination. 
suspend fun createTopic(topicRequest: TopicRequest): CreateTopicResponse

docs.title: Create Topic
docs.text:
Create a new topic.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#create-topic

Attribute Description topicRequest the topic attributes 
suspend fun getTopicAndPosts(topicId, sort, limit, start, end, cursorString): ForumTopicAndPostsResponse

docs.title: Get Topic and Posts
docs.text:
Get topic and its posts.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-topic-and-posts

Attribute Description topicId Id of the topic. sort (Optional) Post sorting option. Valid values are id_asc (default) and id_desc. limit (Optional) Maximum number of posts to be returned (20 default, 50 at most). start (Optional) First post id to be returned with sort set to id_asc. Ignored if cursorString is specified. end (Optional) First post id to be returned with sort set to id_desc. Ignored if cursorString is specified. cursorString (Optional) for pagination. 
suspend fun getForumListing(): List<Forum>

docs.title: Get Forum Listing
docs.text:
Get top-level forums and their subforums (max 2 deep).

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-forum-listing

No parameters.

suspend fun getForumAndTopics(forumId): ForumAndTopicsResponse

docs.title: Get Forum and Topics
docs.text:
Get a forum by id, its pinned topics, recent topics, and its subforums.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-forum-and-topics

Attribute Description forumId Id of the forum. 
suspend fun editTopic(topicId, title): ForumTopic

docs.title: Edit Topic
docs.text:
Edit topic. Only title can be edited through this endpoint.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#edit-topic

Attribute Description topicId Id of the topic. title New topic title. 
suspend fun editPost(postId, body): ForumPost

docs.title: Edit Post
docs.text:
Edit specified forum post.

Implements endpoint: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#edit-post

Attribute Description postId Id of the post. body New post content in BBCode format.
